CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),false, AND( OR(ISBLANK(LastHrsOppCreated__c),AND(NOT(ISBLANK(LastHrsOppCreated__c)),LastHrsOppCreated__c < (NOW() - 90))) ,NOT(Contains(Name,"Paychex")) ,NOT(Contains(Name,"PAYCHEX")) ,NOT(Contains(Name,"Sample")) ,NOT(Contains(Name,"SAMPLE")) ,NOT(Contains(Name,"sample")) ,NOT(Contains(Name,"paychex")) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Oasis Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'PEO Client')) ,ISBLANK(ParentId) ,ISBLANK( SalesParent__c) ,OwnerId != $Label.ReferralOwnerName ,CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = false ,Do_Not_Call__c = false ,Hosted_Client__c = false ,Related_Contact_has_Do_Not_Call__c = false ,ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Bank Referral') = false ,ISNULL(Referral_National_Account__r.Dedicated_Rep__c)=false ,(NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Not Interested")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Disqualified"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(NSSStatus__c ,"Current/Lost Client")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(NSSStatus__c, "Already Contacted/Duplicate"))&& NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Wash"))&&NOT(ISPICKVAL( NSSStatus__c, "Current Client")) ) && ( X401_k__c = false || FSA__c = FALSE ||(NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "Premier")) && NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "HR Solutions"))&& NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "HR Services"))))
, NumberOfEmployees >= 2 , Client_Status__c ="A" , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type, "Advantage Client")) , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type, "Premier Advantage Client")) , Workable_Override__c = FALSE , Benetrac_Indicator__c = false , CurrentClient__c = TRUE , (NumberOfEmployees <=50 || (First_Run_Date__c <= (Today()-90) && NumberOfEmployees >50)) , ISPICKVAL(Account_Managed__c,"" ) , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c , 'Paychex Referral Network')) ,(ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) ) )
CustomField.label: NSS Workable-HRS2
